forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early will evolve into a more steady rain for the afternoon. High around 10C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers this morning, becoming a steady rain during the afternoon hours. High 51F. WSW winds shifting to SE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. Becoming windy late. Low near 10C. Winds SSE at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall may reach 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. Becoming windy overnight. Low 49F. Winds SSE at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Light rain early. Then remaining cloudy. Thunder possible. High near 15C. SSW winds at 25 to 40 km/h, decreasing to 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. Periods of light rain early. Thunder possible. High 58F. SSW winds at 15 to 25 mph, decreasing to 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy in the evening, then off and on rain showers after midnight. Low 11C. Winds SE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy in the evening, then off and on rain showers after midnight. Low 52F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. High near 15C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 59F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 14C. Winds SSE at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 56F. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy at times with periods of rain. High 14C. Winds SSE at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall possibly over 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy and windy at times with periods of rain. High 58F. Winds SSE at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall may reach one inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early, becoming a steady rain late. Low near 10C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the evening will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Low near 50F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. High 13C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. High near 55F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy and damp with rain early...then becoming mostly clear late. Low near 5C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy and damp with rain early...then becoming mostly clear late. Low 42F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny. High 14C. Winds N at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny. High 58F. Winds N at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear. Low 4C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies. Low 39F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly sunny. High 16C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mainly sunny sky. High 62F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early will become overcast later during the night. Low 6C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies in the evening, then becoming cloudy overnight. Low 42F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy. High 16C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies. High 62F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies. Low 8C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies. Low 47F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 18C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. High 64F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy early with increasing clouds overnight. Low 9C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the evening with more clouds for later at night. Low 48F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies. High 17C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy. High 63F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional showers. Low near 10C. Winds SE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional showers. Low 51F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.
